Header.loginRequiredForDashboard: Login is required to access the dashboard.

Footer.description: Start a new investment journey with Cortex, the data-driven investment platform.

Hero.title:
Data Dominates the Market.

Less Emotion, More Strategy.
Hero.subtitle: Validate your investment ideas and automate them 24/7 on Cortex, the all-in-one quant platform for individual investors.
Hero.ctaButton: Test Your First Strategy for Free

FeatureSection.title: The Entire Investment Process in One Place
FeatureSection.subtitle: Cortex supports every step, from brainstorming ideas and verifying strategies to automated execution and sharing.

backtesting.title: Powerful Backtesting
backtesting.description: The past is a mirror to the future. Verify if your strategy actually worked with years of data in under a minute.

autoTrading.title: 24/7 Automated Trading
autoTrading.description: No more emotional intervention. Save your time by executing verified strategies flawlessly, 24/7.

community.title: A Growing Community
community.description: Investing alone is lonely. Share strategies with other investors and grow together through collective intelligence.

Auth.signupSubtitle: Create an account to experience data-driven investing.

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

Auth.loginSubtitle: Log in to Cortex to continue your analysis.

AuthCallback.loginProcessError: An issue occurred during login processing.

Dashboard.fetchError: Failed to load dashboard data: {errorDetail}. Please try again.
Dashboard.accessDeniedMessage: You do not have permission to view this page. Administrator privileges are required.
Dashboard.adminDashboardOverview: Here's an overview of your Cortex application's performance and user base. Manage your system effectively.
Dashboard.userDashboardOverview: Here's a personalized overview of your investment activities. Stay on top of your strategies and bots.
Dashboard.authRequiredMessage: Please log in to access your dashboard.
Dashboard.unknownRoleMessage: Your user role is not recognized. Please contact support.

StrategyBuilder.title: Create New Strategy

form.jsonErrorMessage: Rules are not in a valid JSON format.

StrategyBuilder.indicatorHubDescription: Search and select an indicator for your strategy.
StrategyBuilder.noBuyConditionsYet: No buy conditions added yet. Click the button below to add your first condition.
StrategyBuilder.noSellConditionsYet: No sell conditions added yet. Click the button below to add your first condition.

ParameterPopover.title: Parameters
ParameterPopover.description: Adjust the parameters for this indicator.

BacktestSetupForm.title: Set Up Your Backtest
BacktestSetupForm.description: Configure the parameters to simulate your trading strategy's performance.
BacktestSetupForm.backtestStartedSuccess: Backtest started successfully! Check the list below for status updates.
BacktestSetupForm.endDateBeforeStartDateError: End date cannot be before start date.

BacktestList.title: Your Backtest History
BacktestList.description: View the status and results of your past backtest simulations.
BacktestList.noBacktestsYet: You haven't run any backtests yet.
BacktestList.runFirstBacktestHint: Set up a backtest above to see your history here!

BacktestResultSummary.title: Backtest Performance Summary
BacktestResultSummary.noResultsAvailable: No results available yet. Backtest may still be running or has failed.

EquityChart.title: Equity Curve
EquityChart.notEnoughData: Not enough data to display the chart (at least 2 data points required).
EquityChart.checkBacktestResults: Please check your backtest results. Data might be incomplete or malformed.

TradeLogTable.title: Trade Log
TradeLogTable.noTradeLogsAvailable: No trade logs available for this backtest. It might still be running or has no trades.
